title: Exploring phase transitions and thermal dynamics in nanoconfined liquid crystals using liquid-phase TEM
summary: Nanoconfined liquid crystals (LCs) and their nanocomposites are driving the next generation of photonic applications. Consequently, deepening our understanding of mesophase stability, defect topology, and the dynamic response of LCs at the nanoscale requires the development of novel characterization approaches.
